text: "Twilight Zone" is a 1981 song by British heavy metal band Iron Maiden. It is the fourth single and is the leading single from their second studio album Killers. It went to number 10 in the United Kingdom, number 27 in France and number 31 on the Billboard Mainstream Rock chart. ==Track listing== ;7" single == References == Category:1981 songs Category:Iron Maiden songs Category:Heavy metal
title: Twilight Zone (Iron Maiden song)
